name: recitations_by_juz_number
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool quran_com.
Tool description: The default API of Quran.com website
API description: Fetches a list of ayah recitations for a specified juz number.

recitation_id.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

juz_number.description: The number of the juz for which to fetch ayah recitations.
